prayer.name: Centering Prayer
prayer.text: A simple process of spending time giving God your burdens and asking Him to fill you.

details.title: Palms Down
details.text: Place your palms down. Give to God the stress, worries, frustrations, anger, or fears you are experiencing.

details.title: Palms Up
details.text: Place your palms up. In place of what you've given God, ask Him to fill you with His patience, kindness, peace, and joy for the day.

prayer.name: Fruit Of The Spirit
prayer.text: Pray for the fruit of the Spirit (Galations 5:22-23) for yourself.

details.title: Love
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill you with His Love.

details.title: Joy
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill you with His Joy.

details.title: Peace
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill you with His Peace.

details.title: Patience
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill you with His Patience.

details.title: Kindness
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill you with His Kindness.

details.title: Goodness
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill you with His Goodness.

details.title: Faithfulness
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill you with His Faithfulness.

details.title: Gentleness
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill you with His Gentleness.

details.title: Self-Control
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill you with His Self-Control.

prayer.name: Gifts of the Spirit
prayer.text: Ask God to fill you with His gifts: 1 Corinthians 14:1a - "Follow the way of love and eagerly desire gifts of the Spirit..."

details.title: Gift of Prophecy
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your prophetic gifts. Prophetic gifts strengthen, encourage, and comfort others

details.title: Gift of Serving
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your serving gifts.

details.title: Gift of Teaching
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your teaching gifts.

details.title: Gift of Exhortation
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your encouragement and exhortation gifting.

details.title: Gift of Giving
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your ability and willingness to give.

details.title: Gift of Leadership
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your gift of leadership.

details.title: Gift of Mercy
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your gift of being patient and merciful to others.

details.title: Gift of Faith
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your gift of faith.

details.title: Gifts of Healing
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your healing gifts. It could be physical, spiritual, emotional, and/or mental healing.

details.title: Gift of Distinguishing between Spirits
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your ability to understand and correctly respond to spiritual situations.

details.title: Gift of Tongues
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your ability to speak in tongues and interpret tongues.

details.title: Gift of Administration
details.text: Ask the Holy Spirit to give you/increase your organizational and administrative gifts.

prayer.name: Armor of God
prayer.text: Pray the Armor of God (Ephesians 6:11-17) over yourself.

details.title: Belt of Truth
details.text: Ask God to fill you with the truth.

details.title: Breastplate of Righteousness
details.text: Ask God to fill you with His Righteousness and Purity.

details.title: Sandals of the Readiness that Comes with the Gospel of Peace
details.text: Ask God to fill you with His Peace.

details.title: Shield of Faith
details.text: Ask God to fill you with faith, and make declarations of faith.

details.title: Helmet of Salvation
details.text: Ask God to fill your mind with the Salvation purchased by Jesus.

details.title: Sword of the Spirit, the Word of God
details.text: Pray verses that you know from the Bible to fight against any areas that you are feeling attacked by the enemy.

prayer.name: The Lord's Prayer
prayer.text: Pray through Jesus's prayer from , using each line as a prayer focus.

details.title: Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be your name...
details.text: Recognize God as your loving Father and adore Him with your words.

details.title: Your kingdom come, your will be done, on earth as it is in heaven.
details.text: Invite God to come influence yourself, your family, your workplace, and events of the world.

details.title: Give us this day our daily bread...
details.text: Ask God for the things you need today.

details.title: And forgive us our debts as we have forgiven our debtors.
details.text: Confess your sins and ask for forgiveness. Take time forgiving those who have wronged you.

details.title: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
details.text: Ask God for protection from temptation and the enemy.

prayer.name: ACTS
prayer.text: Praying through four different subjects: Adoration, Confession, Thanksgiving, Seeking.

details.title: Adoration
details.text: Spend time worshiping God and telling Him what you love about Him.

details.title: Confession
details.text: Confess things you have done wrong and ask God for forgiveness. He forgives!

details.title: Thanksgiving
details.text: Tell God thank you for who He is and what He has given you.

details.title: Seeking
details.text: Ask God for things that you need.

prayer.name: Prayer Circles
prayer.text: Pray for increasingly larger circles of influence.

details.title: Self
details.text: Pray for yourself and your own needs.

details.title: Family
details.text: Pray for your family.

details.title: Work/Community
details.text: Pray for those in your circle of friends/co-workers.

details.title: City
details.text: Pray for the city you live in.

details.title: Country
details.text: Pray for your country, its people, and its leaders.

details.title: World
details.text: Pray for the world, especially places that are experiencing pain.
